name: Poke and Pour Cake
ingredients: 1 pkg. cherry, strawberry or raspberry gelatin
instructions: Prepare cake mix following package directions with egg whites and 1 1/2 c. water.
Meanwhile, prepare gelatin, following package directions.
With fork poke holes into cake at 1/2 inch intervals.
Gently pour gelatin evenly over cake.
Serve with whip cream, if desired.
